Activity: Log in to the EHR system and review any new updates or system messages. Check emails for urgent communications from colleagues or supervisors.
Attend a brief team huddle with @rn-1, @ehrv-1, and @his-2 to discuss the day's patient assignments and any potential challenges related to EHR data collection.
Begin patient assessments, emphasizing accurate and thorough data entry into the EHR. Focus on capturing all relevant patient information, including social determinants of health.

Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients during the morning clinic. Answer patient questions and address any concerns regarding vaccine safety and efficacy. Document all vaccination details accurately in the EHR.
Lunch Break - Watch funny videos with @qatest-2 and @mrs-2.

Continue patient assessments and data entry into the EHR. Focus on identifying potential health risks and implementing appropriate interventions. Collaborate with other healthcare professionals as needed.

Administer influenza vaccinations during the afternoon clinic. Ensure proper documentation of all vaccinations in the EHR. Report any adverse reactions or complications to the appropriate authorities.
Review patient charts for completeness and accuracy. Address any missing information or discrepancies. Prepare for handover to the next shift.
Respond to emails, complete any remaining tasks, and prepare for tomorrow's shift.
